amendment.description: Amendment prohibits any funds in the bill from being obligated or expended to pay a contractor for costs paid to an employee if such costs are for a bonus or in excess of the normal salary paid by the contractor to the employee or if such bonus is part of restructuring costs associated with a business combination.
amendment.purpose: An amendment preprinted in the Congressional Record of September 6 as amendment No. 82, to prohibit the use of any funds in the bill to pay for salary bonuses of corporate executives of defense contractors in conjunction with corporate mergers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
